minecrafter_1.desc_unlocked: Natch turns simple things into super structures. He’s an expert builder, and an even better miner. A lifelong inventor who has seven university degrees, he built the Judoka’s dojo on a Saturday afternoon.
minecrafter_1.title: Minecrafter 1

minecrafter_2.desc_unlocked: He has such a powerful brain that it sometimes makes him a bit too confident – he walks around multiplying 7-digit numbers just to show off!
minecrafter_2.title: Minecrafter 2
